001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
012
013import java.math.BigInteger;
014import java.util.Locale;
015
016/**
017 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
018 */
019/**
020 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
021 *
022
023 *
024 * <br>
025 *
026 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}, opCode 121, size 11
027 *
028 * <br>
029 *
030 * 
031 * <table border='1'>
032 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>121</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>11</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>variableSize</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CURRENT_STATUS}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * </table>
040 */@MessageProps(
041    opCode=121,
042    size=11, // or 10
043    variableSize=true,
044    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
045    characteristic=Characteristic.CURRENT_STATUS,
046    request= MalfunctionStatusRequest.class
047)
048public class MalfunctionStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
049    
050    private long codeA;
051    private long codeB;
052    private byte[] remaining;
053
054    private String errorString;
055    
056    public MalfunctionStatusResponse() {}
057    
058    public MalfunctionStatusResponse(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
059        this.cargo = buildCargo(codeA, codeB, remaining);
060        parse(cargo);
061        
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * <table border="1">
066     * <caption>Parsed fields for MalfunctionStatusResponse:</caption>
067     * <tr><td><code>codeA</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
068     * <tr><td><code>codeB</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td><code>remaining</code></td><td><code>Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8)</code></td></tr>
070     * <tr><td><code>errorString</code></td><td><code>getErrorString()</code></td></tr>
071     * </table>
072     */
073    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
074        Validate.isTrue(raw.length >= props().size());
075        this.cargo = raw;
076        this.codeA = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
077        this.codeB = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4);
078        this.remaining = Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8);
079        this.errorString = getErrorString();
080        
081    }
082
083    
084    /**
085     * <table border="1">
086     * <caption>Byte layout for MalfunctionStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
087     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
088     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
096     * </table>
097     */
098    public static byte[] buildCargo(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
099        return Bytes.combine(
100            Bytes.toUint32(codeA),
101            Bytes.toUint32(codeB),
102            remaining
103        );
104    }
105
106    public long getCodeA() {
107        return codeA;
108    }
109
110    public long getCodeB() {
111        return codeB;
112    }
113
114    public byte[] getRemaining() {
115        return remaining;
116    }
117
118    public String getErrorString() {
119        if (!hasMalfunction()) return "";
120        return String.format(Locale.US, "%d-%#x", getCodeA(), getCodeB());
121    }
122
123    public long[][] IGNORABLE_CODES = new long[][]{
124            {0, 0}, // empty
125            {3, 8230}, // 3-0x2026
126            {18, 8311}, // 18-0x2077 (codeA=18, codeB=8311, remaining={2,3,10}
127    };
128
129    public boolean hasMalfunction() {
130        for (long[] code : IGNORABLE_CODES) {
131            if (code[0] == getCodeA() && code[1] == getCodeB()) {
132                return false;
133            }
134        }
135
136        return true;
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    public int size() {
141        return (hasMalfunction() &&
142                !StringUtils.isBlank(getErrorString())) ? 1 : 0;
143    }
144}
